resources.string: Saiy Library
"This is a remote intro"
"This is a remote speech request"
"This is a remote intro and I will start listening"
"The remote speech request was malformed"
"Without these permissions, the app will be unable to use TTS & voice recognition features."
"You have failed to correctly define the action to take. Please include a defined action from the list of ACTIONs in the RemoteRequest class"
"You have failed to correctly define which Text to Speech provider to use. Please include a defined provider from the list of PROVIDER_TTSs in the RemoteRequest class"
"You have failed to correctly define which Voice Recognition provider to use. Please include a defined provider from the list of PROVIDER_VRs in the RemoteRequest class"
"You have failed to include your Google API key in the SaiyConfiguration class"
"You have failed to include your Google access token in the SaiyConfiguration class. Alternatively, the token expiry time may be too short or omitted."
"You have failed to include your Nuance API key in the SaiyConfiguration class"
"The Nuance HOST must be set to nmsps.dev.nuance.com to use Mix.nlu"
"You have failed to include your microsoft credentials in the SaiyConfiguration class"
"You have failed to include your Wit credentials in the SaiyConfiguration class"
"You have failed to include your IBM credentials in the SaiyConfiguration class"
"You haven't set the utterance to speak. If you require silence, please use the constant SILENCE in the RemoteRequest class, so it is noted as deliberate"
"This application cannot complete your speech request."
"Package %1$s has been blacklisted and therefore denied remote access. The user can release this restriction, should they wish, from the Saiy Settings."
"null package name request to remote Saiy service. Declining"
"Too many remote requests made in a short period. Declining"
"null intent request to remote Saiy service. Declining"
"SaiyListener null and request is being ignored"
"Remote Bundle is corrupt and request is being ignored"
"Remote Bundle is null. Request is being ignored"
"Remote RequestParcel parameters are invalid. Request is being ignored"
"Remote RequestParcel is invalid. Request is being ignored"
"Request id is null or empty. Request is being ignored"
"Utterance is null or empty. Should request SILENCE. Request is being ignored"
"Unknown ACTION request is being ignored"
"Unknown Defaults.TTS request is being ignored"
"Unknown Defaults.VR request is being ignored"
"Unknown Defaults.LanguageModel request is being ignored"
"NUANCE API config error - request is being ignored"
"MICROSOFT API config error - request is being ignored"
"GOOGLE API key missing - request is being ignored"
"REMOTE config error - request is being ignored"
